verbs.description: After two years of campaigning and a year and a half in office , one thing [V: has] become clear : If Donald Trump calls it “ fake news , ” that is virtually prima facie proof that whatever story he ’s responding to is true . The latest example was the story last year that he dictated the statement from his son …
